bioconda.name: bioconductor-maigespack
bioconda.summary: Functions to handle cDNA microarray data, including several methods of data analysis

biotools.summary: This package uses functions of various other packages together with other functions in a coordinated way to handle and analyse cDNA microarray data.

bioschemas.name: maigesPack
bioschemas.summary: This package uses functions of various other packages together with other functions in a coordinated way to handle and analyse cDNA microarray data.
